TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionAuthenticationModule extends System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase

summary.span: 實作 ASP.NET 模組，它會處理在 WS-Federation 案例中的工作階段 cookie。

span.span: Implements an ASP.NET module that processes session cookies in WS-Federation scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的 ASP.NET 管線中存在時(SAM) 會處理在 WS-同盟案例中的工作階段 cookie。When present in the ASP.NET pipeline, the (SAM) processes session cookies in WS-Federation scenarios. 它會使用指定的 cookie 處理常式屬性未經處理的工作階段 cookie 讀取 HTTP 要求，並將資料寫入 HTTP 回應。It uses the cookie handler specified by the property to read the raw session cookie from the HTTP request and write it to the HTTP response. 它會使用，已針對應用程式來還原序列化至未經處理的工作階段 cookie物件。It uses the that is configured for an application to deserialize the raw session cookie into objects. 工作階段安全性權杖包含宣告 () 及主體 () 正在處理要求的實體與相關聯。The session security token contains the claims () and principal () associated with the entity for which the request is being served. SAM 加入其事件處理常式來ASP.NET 管線中的事件。The SAM adds its event handler to the event in the ASP.NET pipeline. 這個處理常式會攔截登入要求，如果工作階段 cookie，將它還原序列化為工作階段權杖，並設定和屬性，以包含在工作階段權杖的宣告主體。This handler intercepts sign-in requests, and, if there is a session cookie, deserializes it into a session token, and sets the and properties to the claims principal contained in the session token. 它會叫用數個在此程序 SAM 所公開的其他方法。It invokes several of the other methods exposed by the SAM during this process. 可以叫用方法，以將使用者登出工作階段 （例如，在 SignOut.aspx.cs 的程式碼後置檔案）。The method can be invoked to sign the user out of a session (for example, in a SignOut.aspx.cs code-behind file). SAM 會公開數個事件，提供存取至其處理管線。The SAM exposes several events that provide access to its processing pipeline. 和事件可讓您修改所讀取的 cookie 或在處理期間建立工作階段權杖。The and events enable you to modify session tokens that are read from cookies or created during processing. 一般而言，這是以新增、 移除或轉換權杖中的宣告或調整其到期時間。Typically, this is done to add, remove, or transform claims in the token or to adjust its expiration time. ， ，和事件提供處理登出要求到攔截程序。The , , and events provide hooks into the processing of sign-out requests. 對許多案例中，只要加入這些事件中，處理常式通常 global.asax.cs 檔案，將會就已經夠用。For many scenarios, simply adding handlers for these events, often to the global.asax.cs file, will be sufficient. 更複雜的情況下，您可以從衍生來實作自訂的 SAM。For more complicated scenarios, you can derive from to implement a custom SAM. 為此，許多方法可叫用期間和會公開，讓您可以在工作階段處理生命週期的特定階段提供自訂行為。To this end, many of the methods that are invoked during and are exposed so that you can provide custom behavior at specific stages of the session processing lifecycle. 您也可以將它加入至之下的 HTTP 模組組態檔中的 ASP.NET 管線新增 SAM``元素，如 IIS 7 及更新版本的版本或下``IIS 7 之前的版本中的項目。You can add the SAM to the ASP.NET pipeline in a configuration file by adding it to the HTTP modules under either the `` element for IIS version 7 and later or under the `` element for versions prior to IIS 7. SAM 所使用的 cookie 處理常式可以設定為使用[ <Requiressl> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)項目。The cookie handler used by the SAM can be configured with the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifSAM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#1)] 下列 XML 會示範如何設定 SAM ASP.NET 管線中。The following XML shows how to configure the SAM in the ASP.NET pipeline. 為求簡單明瞭，已省略此處出現在一般設定中的其他許多項目。Many other elements that are present in a typical configuration are omitted here for brevity. ```xml ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定是否應該將工作階段資訊 (宣告值等) 儲存在工作階段 Cookie 中，或者是否應該將工作階段內容儲存在伺服器端 (使用 Cookie 只儲存參考)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the session information (claim values, etc.) should be stored in the session cookie or whether the session content should be stored on the server side, using the cookie to store just a reference.

value.span: 如果已發行的 Cookie 處於參考模式，則為 ，否則為。

span.span: if issued cookies are in reference mode; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設是，指定所簽發的 cookie 未進入參考模式。

span.span: The default is , which specifies that issued cookies are not in reference mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在參考模式中，會儲存在伺服器端快取 (衍生自物件)。In reference mode, the is stored in a server-side cache (an object that derives from ). 發行的 cookie 只會包含用來從快取中擷取語彙基元，為內容識別碼。The issued cookie just contains a context identifier that is used to retrieve the token from the cache. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在參考模式運作，Microsoft 建議您提供的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案，並在設定中的事件屬性對這個語彙基元傳入屬性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 這可確保工作階段權杖仍會為每個要求的參考模式運作，並會優先使用前者只設定工作階段驗證模組上的屬性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnAuthenticateRequest (object sender, EventArgs eventArgs);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAuthenticateRequest(object sender, class System.EventArgs eventArgs) cil managed
protected: virtual void OnAuthenticateRequest(System::Object ^ sender, EventArgs ^ eventArgs);
abstract member OnAuthenticateRequest : obj * EventArgs -> unit override this.OnAuthenticateRequest : obj * EventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的來源。

span.span: The source for the event.

param.span: 這個將會是 物件。

span.span: This will be an object.

param.name: eventArgs
param.span: 事件的資料。

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 處理來自 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp] (~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 管線的 事件。

span.span: Handles the event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行下列動作：This method does the following: 1. 叫用方法來讀取從工作階段 cookie，如果有的話。Invokes the method to read a from the session cookie, if one is present. 2. 如果工作階段安全性權杖不能讀取 （很可能是由於工作階段尚未建立），就會傳回。If a session security token cannot be read (most likely because a session has not been established), return. 3. 叫用方法，以引發事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 這會提供一個機會，讀取要修改的 cookie 語彙基元或取消要求。This provides an opportunity for the token read from the cookie to be modified or for the request to be canceled. 此處理常式也可以指定的語彙基元應該重新發出，藉由設定屬性。The handler can also specify that the token should be reissued, by setting the property. 4. 如果語彙基元來重新發出，從快取中移除，並叫用方法，以引發事件。If the token is to be reissued, removes it from the cache and invokes the method to raise the event. 這會提供要一次修改的語彙基元的機會。This provides opportunity for the token to again be modified. 請重新發出行為也可以藉由設定修改事件處理常式中的屬性。The reissue behavior can also be modified by setting the property in the event handler. 5. 叫用方法來驗證使用者。Invokes the method to authenticate the user. 如果成功，這已設定的效果主體中所包含的屬性連入權杖的屬性。If successful, this has the effect of setting the property to the principal that is contained in the property of the incoming token. 6. 如果工作階段已過期，會叫用方法。If the session has expired, invokes the method. 方法會加入至的處理常式中的事件方法。The method is added to the handlers for the event in the method.

exception.span: 不是有效的已設定工作階段權杖處理常式。

span.span: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
(There is no configured in the property.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SessionSecurityTokenCreated As EventHandler(Of SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 已經建立工作階段安全性權杖時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a session security token has been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要修改的工作階段安全性權杖寫入 cookie 之前，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to modify the session security token before it is written to a cookie. 內引發事件方法之後的工作階段語彙基元 () 已建立。The event is raised from within the method after a session token () has been created. 發生這種情況，例如，如果事件處理常式事件修改語彙基元。This happens, for example, if an event handler for the event modifies the token. 若要修改的工作階段權杖的內容，然後再進一步沿著管線傳遞和用來驗證要求 （使用者） 的實體，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user). 在事件處理常式，您可以存取透過語彙基元屬性。In an event handler, you can access the token through the property. 在修改後權杖，您可以確保，它就會寫入 cookie 設定屬性`true`。After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the property to `true`. 不同的是，事件，不是可取消事件。Unlike, the event, is not a cancelable event. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案的 ASP.NET web 應用程式中實作的事件。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 您也必須將此處理常式加入事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 更完整的範例所示概觀主題。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SessionSecurityTokenReceived As EventHandler(Of SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs)

summary.span: 已經從 cookie 讀取工作階段安全性權杖時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a session security token has been read from a cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內引發事件方法之後的工作階段語彙基元 () 已成功讀取從工作階段 cookie。The event is raised from within the method after a session token () has been successfully read from the session cookie. 若要修改的工作階段權杖的內容，然後再進一步沿著管線傳遞和用來驗證要求 （使用者） 的實體，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user). 其中一個最常見的案例需要修改的工作階段到期時間 (可透過存取屬性) 來覆寫透過組態中設定的工作階段到期時間`lifetime`屬性[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)項目。One of the most common scenarios involves modifying the session expiration time (accessible through the property) to override the session expiration time set in configuration through the `lifetime` attribute of the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element. 藉由修改每個要求上的這個屬性，您可以實作滑動的工作階段中。也就是說，存留期會擴充每個工作階段的時間的使用者存取站台。By modifying this property on each request, you can implement a sliding session; that is, a session in which the lifetime is extended each time the user accesses the site. 在事件處理常式，您可以存取透過語彙基元屬性。In an event handler, you can access the token through the property. 在修改後權杖，您可以確保，它就會寫入 cookie 設定至`true`。After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the to `true`. 最後，事件是否可取消事件，而您可以設定屬性中止要求的進一步處理。Finally, the event is a cancelable event, and you can set the property of the to abort further processing of the request. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案的 ASP.NET web 應用程式中實作的事件。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 您也必須將此處理常式加入事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 更完整的範例所示概觀主題。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#5)]

abstract member SetPrincipalFromSessionToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken -> unit override this.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken -> unit

param.name: sessionSecurityToken
param.span: 要從中設定主體的工作階段權杖。

span.span: The session token from which to set the principal.

summary.span: 將 和 的主體設為指定工作階段權杖中包含的主體。

span.span: Sets the principal on the and to the principal that is contained in the specified session token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 叫用方法和集合屬性和屬性使用傳回的身分識別。Invokes the method and sets the property and the property on using the identities that are returned. 這個方法從呼叫方法。This method is called from the method.

summary.span: 使用者已登出之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the user is signed out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從引發方法之後叫用方法。Raised from the method just after the method is invoked. 不保證會針對每個工作階段呼叫這個事件。This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session. 比方說，cookie 可能會遭到刪除用戶端中，在此情況下，此事件會永遠不會升級，因為沒有伺服器端事件用來刪除工作階段。For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案的 ASP.NET web 應用程式中實作的事件。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 您也必須將此處理常式加入事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 更完整的範例所示概觀主題。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#3)]

summary.span: 刪除登入工作階段之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before deleting the sign-in session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從引發方法之前叫用方法。Raised from the method just before the method is invoked. 不保證會針對每個工作階段呼叫這個事件。This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session. 比方說，cookie 可能會遭到刪除用戶端中，在此情況下，此事件會永遠不會升級，因為沒有伺服器端事件用來刪除工作階段。For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案的 ASP.NET web 應用程式中實作的事件。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 您也必須將此處理常式加入事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 更完整的範例所示概觀主題。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SignOut() cil managed
abstract member SignOut : unit -> unit override this.SignOut : unit -> unit

summary.span: 將目前使用者登出並引發適當的事件。

span.span: Signs the current user out and raises the associated events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 叫用， ，和方法以執行登出。如果發生例外狀況，方法會叫用來引發事件。Invokes the , , and methods to perform sign-out. If an exception occurs, the method is invoked to raise the event. 您可以設定屬性物件傳遞至這個事件來取消登出，並防止傳播至用戶端所造成的例外狀況的事件處理常式。You can set the property of the object passed into the event handler for this event to cancel the sign-out and prevent the exception from being propagated to the client. 您可以覆寫這個方法可加入應用程式特有的行為。You can override this method to add application-specific behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼顯示程式碼叫用從 SignOut.aspx 網頁 (SignOut.aspx.cs) 中 ASP.NET web 應用程式的方法。The following code shows code for invoking the method from a SignOut.aspx page (SignOut.aspx.cs) in an ASP.NET web application. 更完整的範例所示概觀主題。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SignOutError As EventHandler(Of ErrorEventArgs)

summary.span: 當登出期間發生錯誤時發生。

span.span: Occurs when there is an error during sign-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從引發登出期間發生錯誤時的方法。Raised from the method when an error occurs during sign-out. 在事件處理常式，您可以取得所產生的事件所引發的例外狀況屬性。In an event handler, you can get the exception that resulted in the event being raised from the property. 您可以進一步的結果為未設定傳播至用戶端，例外狀況的例外狀況處理來取消屬性至`true`。You can cancel further processing of the exception, which has the result of not propagating the exception to the client, by setting the property of the to `true`. 不保證會針對每個工作階段呼叫這個事件。This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session. 比方說，cookie 可能會遭到刪除用戶端中，在此情況下，此事件會永遠不會升級，因為沒有伺服器端事件用來刪除工作階段。For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案的 ASP.NET web 應用程式中實作的事件。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 您也必須將此處理常式加入事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 更完整的範例所示概觀主題。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 cookie 處理常式中設定的讀取 cookie屬性然後再叫用方法來讀取權杖 cookie 中。Reads the cookie by using the cookie handler that is configured in the property and then invokes the method to read the token from the cookie.
